summary: Completed comprehensive i18n (internationalization) testing for Alpha Crypto platform. All 4 pages (ConsultingPage, EarlySignalsPage, InvestmentAnalysisPage, AirdropDetailPage) plus Footer have full Spanish/English translation support working correctly. Language toggle in navigation bar successfully switches between ES/EN.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All i18n translations tested and working. Language toggle (data-testid='language-toggle') in Navigation.js switches between ES/EN. Default language is Spanish (ES). Each page uses useLanguage hook from LanguageContext.js with tx object containing translations.

language_toggle.details: Language toggle in navigation bar correctly switches between ES (游쀯릖) and EN (游쥟릖). Toggle persists language preference in localStorage.
